code: import React from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import{removeNotification}from'../../store/uiSlice';import'./Notifications.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Notifications=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{notifications}=useSelector(state=>state.ui);React.useEffect(()=>{if(notifications.length>0){const timer=setTimeout(()=>{dispatch(removeNotification(notifications[0].id));},5000);return()=>clearTimeout(timer);}},[notifications,dispatch]);if(notifications.length===0){return null;}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"notifications-container",children:notifications.map(notification=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification ".concat(notification.type),onClick:()=>dispatch(removeNotification(notification.id)),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"notification-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"notification-icon",children:[notification.type==='success'&&'✓',notification.type==='error'&&'✗',notification.type==='warning'&&'⚠',notification.type==='info'&&'ℹ']}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"notification-message",children:notification.message})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"notification-close",onClick:()=>dispatch(removeNotification(notification.id)),children:"\xD7"})]},notification.id))});};export default Notifications;
